name: Small Worm
desc:
Mindin' its own business.
Shall I interfere?

name: Rat Duo
desc:
It is getting out of hand.
Now there are two of them.

name: Momma Boar
desc:
It follows you around.
No matter what you do.

name: Eight-legged Menace
desc:
Always appears out of nowhere.
A little bit more scary at night.

name: Swarm of Bees
desc:
No matter what you do.
You stay totally surrounded.

name: Ring of Love
desc:
Keeps your heart warm.
Could bring back lost memories.

name: Cinnamon Cookie
desc:
Oh yeah... finally.
Give me that cookie!

name: Old Wolf
desc:
I feel like something is crawling around.
Hopefully not some hungry beast.

name: Giant Web
message: Spider-Mom caught you in her web.

name: Pile of Wood
desc:
The owner is probably nearby.
I'd rather not mess with it.
message: A lumberjack hit you with his axe.
